entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 35. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Friday 24 March 2023
